headline: Is J.B. Hunt (JBHT) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback And DCF Estimate?
summary: If you are wondering whether J.B. Hunt Transport Services at around US$221.76 is priced attractively or not, the key question is how that share price lines up with the company’s underlying value. The stock has pulled back about 3.2% over the last 7 days, after an 8.5% move over 30 days and returns of 12.7% year to date and 28.7% over 1 year, which may have shifted how the market views its risk and reward profile. Recent news coverage has focused on J.B. Hunt’s role as a major U.S...
